heading: About Kevin
blurb: • 6+ years in HR & recruitment (hired/trained 400+ staff from 50+ countries)
• International experience in the US, Europe, and Japan

I grew up between cultures — Filipino-American in California, then Arizona, then Europe, and now Japan. That journey taught me first-hand how language and culture shape identity. English with Kevin is here to help professionals communicate confidently in English without losing who they are.
